localised_text.tooltip_text: Population surplus cost||This is the amount of [[img:icon_pop_surplus]][[/img]]population surplus required to recruit this character.||This amount will be subtracted from the horde where this character is recruited from.
Cost||This amount will be deducted from your {{tr:icon_treasury}}{{tr:treasury}} in order to recruit this character.
Upkeep||This amount will be deducted from your {{tr:icon_treasury}}{{tr:treasury}} each turn while this character exists.
Influence||This is the amount of [[img:icon_influence]][[/img]]influence required to recruit this character.
[[col:green]]This Black Ark has previously constructed buildings.[[/col]]
